description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 2b. Physical description: 31 lines per page; written in small naskh in black on glazed, laid European paper. Rubrication and catchwords; a few marginal notes. Mild staining. Origin: 25 Ramaḍān 1256 H [20 November 1840], by Aḥmad khalaf al-marḥūm al-Sayyid Ṣāliḥ najl al-mabrūr al-Sayyid Qāsim al-Faḥḥām (leaf 151b). Incipit: الحمد لله الذي ختم الشرايع باسمحها طريقة واوضحها حقيقة
author: Najafī, Muḥammad Ḥasan ibn Bāqir, approximately 1788-1850
abstract: Commentary on al-Muḥaqqiq al-Ḥillī's Sharāʼiʻ al-Islām; contains kitāb al-ṭahārah. Same scribe as New Series no. 395q and 360q.
extent: 252 leaves : paper ; 299 x 199 (220 x 121) mm bound to 300 x 204 mm
title: Jawāhir al-kalām fī sharḥ Sharāʼiʻ al-Islām
uniform_title: جواهر الكلام في شرح شرائع الاسلام. كتاب الطهارة
creator: نجفي، محمد حسن بن باقر، approximately 1788-1850
subject: Muḥaqqiq al-Ḥillī, Jaʻfar ibn al-Ḥasan, 1205 or 1206-1277—Sharāʼiʻ al-Islām.
binding_note: Contemporary full brown leather with blind-stamped central mandorla, pendants and fillets; yellow paper doublures.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
